description: Number of self-avoiding walks of length n from origin in strip Z X {0,1}.
comments: For n>=2, a(n) coincides with A110935. [From _Eric Rowland_, Mar 09 2009]
references: J. Labelle, Self-avoiding walks and polyominoes in strips, Bull. ICA, 23 (1998), 88-98.
links: D. Zeilberger, [math/9506214] Self avoiding walks, the language of science and Fibonacci numbers
maple: f := n->if n mod 2 = 0 then 8*fibonacci(n)-n else 8*fibonacci(n)-4; fi;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
